text: The 1975 Wayne State Tartars football team represented Wayne State University as a member of the Great Lakes Intercollegiate Athletic Conference (GLIAC) during the 1975 NCAA Division II football season. In their second year under head coach Dick Lowry, the Tartars compiled an 8–3 record (3–1 against GLIAC opponents) and won the GLIAC championship. ==Schedule== ==References== Wayne State Category:Wayne State Warriors football seasons Category:Great Lakes Intercollegiate Athletic Conference champion seasons Wayne State Football
title: 1975 Wayne State Tartars football team
